## TemplateBuildingBlock type

Represents the data of a Template Building Block: a re-usable template module.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type TemplateBuildingBlock = Template & {
    ApprovalStatus?: Link;
    WorkflowInfo?: WorkflowInfo;
};
```
